item.title: [PI] ::veng & ::barrage Command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“vigilante, post:4, topic:383525”]Try This Command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("veng") && c.playerRights >= 0) { c.sendMessage("Vengeance Bitch"); c.getItems().addItem(560, 100); c.getItems().addItem(9075, 200); c.getItems().addItem(557, 500); } }[/quote]

I think he added it in his mod , admin or owner commands , so that might give an error because a player cant be 2 ranks at the same time…

buttt i made something like that but it only give u when ur a staff member :s while i didnt add that in the command

here is the command plz tell me what need to be fixed or changed or send me a new command plz
